Docs.summary:
Indicates whether OS upgrades should automatically be applied to scale set instances in a rolling fashion when a newer version of the OS image becomes available.

If this is set to true for Windows based pools, [WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/batchservice/pool/add?tabs=HTTP#windowsconfiguration) cannot be set to true.

member this.UseRollingUpgradePolicy : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates whether rolling upgrade policy should be used during Auto OS Upgrade. Auto OS Upgrade will fallback to the default policy if no policy is defined on the VMSS.
